504	        # What is happening here is that the run_op defined above for the mock only completes
505	        # ops of type UpdateSasTokenOperation (i.e. variable 'op'). However, completing the
506	        # op triggers a callback which halts the completion, and then spawn a reauthorize_connection worker op,
507	        # which must be completed before full completion of 'op' can occur. However, as the above
508	        # run_op mock only completes ops of type UpdateSasTokenOperation, this never happens,
509	        # thus op is not completed.
